title: "lol we coulda ended like 20 min ago"
body:
But instead you decided to dick around for 20 more minutes and then throw the game.

What an interesting strategy.

replies.body: welcome to solo queue.
Gotta make sure I can get an S+ rank this time.  Don't worry guys, we just need to stall a bit longer ~~and let the other team catch up to our full builds.~~

But I'm slightly behind the enemy ADC in farm and desperately need that big bot lane wave. I NEED IT.

Enemy makes a catch and it turns into a 4v5. We lose.

ADC says "Why did you guys fight without me?"

Every.ADC.Ever.

Aced enemy team with a large minion wave pushing mid.  Goes to do enemy raptor camp - Every ADC ever

3 Waves pushing on inhib towers, enemy team frantically clearing waves, Baron and dragon up.  Smites blue buff and wolves - Every Jungler ever

Assassin trying to zone enemy but not fight.  Tank initiates on enemy team but squishies are positioned well and cannot be picked off.  Tank - "Why you no go in?"

Thresh throws lantern, then walks outside its max range.

Midlane Viktor rushes Abyssal into Talon.  "It was on my recommended".
Welcome to the reason many low ranking LCS teams lose.
This is the sole reason C9 won their game vs TSM.

20 minutes in, adc didn't get fed, he calls for a surrender 3 times 
35 minutes in,  we barely catch up and surpass enemy team, going for final push 
Our adc (3/12/4)-"no don't end it yet we have to embarrass there varus"
Dafuq
*their
You very much missed his point.
Point or not, when some know the grammar of a language that's not even their mother one better than those native to it, it's time for some to reconsider their priorities in life.
what if its a direct quote from that adc?

So many jimmies rustled, it appears kiddies have trouble with getting their grammar corrected. Face it people, there =/= their =/= they're, than is an actual word and CAN NOT be replaced by then when used for comparison.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Than

{{champion:201}}  : Then... go teach English at a school than stay here playing League of Legends or meet each other in real life and settle the dispute smh don't fight or argue behind a screen. Y U NO TEACH IN ENGRISH SCHOOR RE? OCD? GREMMAR NAZI? NO REGERTS >.<
'aight
I want you to understand that if you said that sentence out loud you would sound like an idiot...JS

> [{quoted}](name=iamthegoatofwar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0oyQn9KA,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-31T22:53:05.447+0000)
>
> I want you to understand that if you said that sentence out loud you would sound like an idiot...JS

^ This you idiot.  You don't even have the intelligence to understand what you yourself are trying to bag on someone for.  You're bad kid and you're bad at trying to make people feel dumb.  Good luck in life, I hope you don't fail if you haven't failed already.
Says the kid that fu#$ed up that entire sentence.

You're calling me a kid, yet you don't even have the gutts to type "fucked". Oh the irony.

By the way, what does grammar have to do with syntax?

Apples-oranges.

I'm sorry OP... but

Some men aren't looking for anything logical, like wins. They can't be bought, bullied, reasoned, or negotiated with... Some men just want to watch the enemy champions burn.
Thank you Alfred.
Sometimes it's more important to have fun.
Doing nothing but trying to kill the other players with no purpose to it at all except maybe making their game experience horrible and earning you reports from both teams for some reason sure is fun.

> [{quoted}](name=zall75,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0oyQn9KA,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-05-31T19:30:04.466+0000)
>
> Doing nothing but trying to kill the other players with no purpose to it at all except maybe making their game experience horrible and earning you reports from both teams for some reason sure is fun.



How is it making the other teams game experience horrible? You never had a game where you wanted to dick around and farm nasus Q for 1k stacks? or try to solo baron. 


You don't have to win the game to have fun.

In normals, that kind of fun is perfectly fine.

Ranked? Stay the fuck away.

Is baron solo even a big deal anymore? I am new and not even 30 yet and I already solo'd him several times :L Any ADC or melee champ with life steal and high attack speed will do it with ease, like as in you dont even lose hp ease.
Win that slips trough greedy fingers is opposite to "having fun"..

Nope, I don't always have to win to have fun. I had a game where Draven wanted to try to solo baron and a Nasus that wanted to hit 1k stacks it was fun.


The goals in that game wasn't to win, but to test things out.

Meh, I think the goal is to win since if it isnt, you are in the wrong game, but that doesnt mean dont have fun while you do it. It is when you start putting fun over the overall goal that it becomes a problem in my eyes, I love nasus and getting to extremely high stacks and basically 1 shotting people is a thrill, I love becoming that thing that people fear in Nasus, but only if the game last that long naturally, if it can end quickly, you don't really have a right to force 4 others to continue when it can end now, that would turn the game into a 4v5 and you get reported for a bannable offense even if you still win, was that fun worth the risk of a ban?

Its a thin line between having fun and being a douche to the other 4 or even 9 people. Maybe the enemy wants the game to end but dont want to afk in base and at least lose fighting, you now are making them wait as well.

No one said anything about forcing your team, if they let you farm and screw around with you I see no problem.

If the other team doesn't want to continue they can surrender, or wait it out to catch up to the lead we had and turn the game around. I don't see an issue here at all.



I remember when my team  had aced the other team at their inhibitor and surrendered. We thought that was funny as hell, other team did too.

It is different if you are all on board with whatever it is that is being done, from what I got from what you said before, it sounded like if you or the player in mention just decided to do it yourself/themselves and didn't say anything or care what their teammates thought. I apologize for that.

> [{quoted}](name=acadiaum,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0oyQn9KA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-31T14:14:01.891+0000)
>
> Sometimes it's more important to have fun.

http://media.giphy.com/media/6J9EYB2Z27Qg8/giphy.gif

https://media1.giphy.com/media/12a4n4RTsrNGyQ/200.gif

https://media4.giphy.com/media/EFWewhdrIAgIo/200.gif

http://media.giphy.com/media/8NQ7T1ExRuMz6/giphy.gif
Oh no lets not play the game to have fun

> [{quoted}](name=Ghos,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0oyQn9KA,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-31T08:00:18.311+0000)
>
> Oh, but you decided to dick around for 20 more minutes and then throw the game.
> 
> What an interesting strategy.

This is what I loved about AP Kog when I mained him. The enemy team would get ahead and then dance around mid doing nothing but spamming laugh. 20 minutes later, they're starring at the defeat screen and wondering what happened.
Let's see if it pans out for them, Cotton.
Pepper Brooks.

I hate morons who play the killfest dance in front of the fountain to pad their stats.  I've seen many a game lost to that idiocy, especially in this hard CC meta.  Show boating gets you killed, plain and simple.  Getting killed loses games.  It's not freakin' rocket science.  End the dame game.  This is why I insist on playing ADC.  If no one else will beat the damn nexus down, _I_ will.__

I have one better. Let's blow our 12:3 lead (I was 8:1:3 on Diana working hard to carry) by running directly up mid into a 1v5, one at a time constantly for 25 deaths trying to kill their mid inhibitor tower while I sit at our mid inhibitor tower and stare it utter shock and amazement. 

T_T (someone do the tear thing, I don't know how)
Click the Doran's ring in gray next to the cancel/post button, it should bring up a big box of all items.  Same goes for summoner spells and champions.

True, true.

Why to destroy their side lanes and win if we can dick around mid lane for 10 minutes after taking their inhibitor doing nothing but looking pretty?

How many times I lost, because of people like this, I can't fathom.
But but... it's EUNE...

I completely get your point. however, what you don't realize is that the way you feel about losing the game is the same way you made your teammates feel, just delayed. If you want to climb the ladder, when you have an opportunity to win a game, take it. You never know what your teammates are feeling or thinking, and for all you know they are having one hell of a time carrying the game. Instead of worrying about your own score, worry about winning the game for your team. This really is a major  reason why some people are able to climb, and others just sit in bronze silver talking about elo hell.

I had some game in my Gold promos where I had somewhere around 17 or 18 kills with wu. Instead of grouping, on the open inhib, my team decides to keep splitting. While their Yi was behind, give him enough time and he'll eventually become a monster, which he did, as they kept getting caught out. A game that should have been over at 20 was over close to 50 with us losing because people think this is TDM.
{{champion:50}} A calculated risk.
Welcome to League of Rat Kids. And Riot encourage that with overpower releases.
pretty much ya
story of my league life. aka my life.

It looks better you know, when you have 20+ kills each match but havnt won a single match in the last 20 matched.. It looks good to have a high kill rate! 

Thats the point of league I think *nods*
